item.description:
Christopher Martin's Pub on State Street hosts a yearly "Run for Children" 5k.  Join NHCer Miguel for the race and Post-Race festivities.  Join AJ for this years Race and Post-Race Festivities.

The course is a 5k (or ~3.1mi) around downtown New Haven, starting and ending at Christopher Martin's.  Entry fee is $15, or $5 with the donation of a Toy.  Everyone is responsible for their own sign up and entry, you can sign up at http://www.jbsports.com/ or at "Trailblazer" stores in Downtown New Haven and Branford. Sign up early if you can, as this race often sells out and many times has little to no availability on Race-Day.

Christopher Martin's also puts on a Great Post Race Party in their parking lot including Food and Beer for the Runners.

We don't all have to run together due to pacing reasons, but feel free to use the Meetup comments and mail to coordinate if you want race buddies.  See you at the finish line and beer/grub tent!

Special thanks to Miguel for hosting this Meetup!  He will post additional contact info soon.Unless Miguel suddenly has a spurt of luck to come after all, I (A.J.) will take over as host in his place.  The "Meeting Up" part is predominantly at the after party though I.M.O. and if you have trouble finding me there you can give me a text or ring at 315-345-9348.

For more info, see the copy and Paste from the event advertisements below:

>Register now! Christopher Martins Christmas Run for Children The 2011 race WILL sell out! http://www.jbsports.c... Join us for the 27th Annual Christopher Martins Christmas Run for Children on Sunday, December 11th at 10:15 a.m. Race entries are running well ahead of last year's record pace. We are approaching 1,500 runners! Register now to guarantee your spot. Race applications have been mailed. Visit JB Sports to print out an entry form or register online. If you have already registered- check jbsports.com for a pre registered list of runners. Make sure you are on it! Don't miss out on Connecticut's favorite winter race and post-race party. Runners can enjoy food, festivities, beer and prizes! Entry Fee is $15 in advance. Participants can lower this entry fee to $5 if they donate a new, unwrapped toy to the race. Please bring toys to Christopher Martins or Trailblazer (New Haven or Branford stores). In order to pay the $5, please drop off your application to Trailblazer or mail it to Christopher Martins, 2 Buena Vista Rd., Branford, CT 06405. Raceday entries will not be accepted and we expect to reach our limit well before the race! Long sleeve technical shirts are available for purchase. Send in an additional $15 with your application or pay $20 on raceday. Order now to guarantee your size! We hope to make Christmas a little brighter for needy children in the New Haven area by giving them not only a toy, but the message of love from friends and neighbors they have never met. Over the years, our race has given over 50,000 toys to children. Join us and make a difference!<
item.how_to_find_us: Miguel will host this meetup and post his contact information for Post Race Festivities.
item.name: Christopher Martins Christmas Run for Children 5k
